/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. In the distance, a crane can be seen, indicating ongoing construction or development in the area. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the details of the buildings and the street.
